descriptionIntro.title: Operating principle
content: Imagine inviting a Discord bot for the game Conqueror's Blade. You apply a configuration to it and this configuration automatically sets up a website and a mobile application.

With these 3 apps, your users have the choice to fill out their barracks information via the website or mobile app and their hero information as well as their presence in territory wars via the Discord Bot, the website or the mobile app. A multi-platform system for your users.
And you, as a manager of territory wars, who do you win?
You can prepare for territory wars in a simplified and optimized way for groups via the website.

descriptionSections.title: Discord Bot
commands: Used to configure the bot for your server‚Ä¢ If the bot has never been configured: all users can use this command‚Ä¢ If the bot has an existing setting for the server, only members of the management group or the owner of the Discord server can change the setting
The commands are explained by the bot
Displays the link to the website associated with the bot
Displays help information about Conqueror's Blade
Update the weapon played with by your hero
Generates a connection token for the mobile application
Manual reset of GvG registration reaction message (manager only)
Activate or deactivate the GvG registration message (manager only)

descriptionSections.title: List of parameter Discord Bot need (command /config)
commands: Language in which the Discord bot will send messages on Discord
Chan Discord where users will register (message with reaction buttons).
Chan Discord or information messages to the bot user will be displayed (new unit added, etc.).
Chan Discord or administration information messages will be displayed (user leaves Discord and is deleted from the database).
Group who will have access to the website to fill in their details (barrack, lvl, etc.).
Group who will have access to the Discord bot administration.

accueil.description: What is Easy Management GvG?</br>It's a territory war management system for the Conqueror's Blade game.</br>This system is made up of 3 interconnected applications:</br>un bot Discord, ce site internet et une application mobile.

caserne.consulcaserne: Select the barrack of the player you wish to see
caserne.avertissement: Remember to save your fire station by clicking on the "Updating my barrack" button at the bottom of the page.

group_type.description: Save will overwrite the corresponding test group.</br>When a sample group is loaded, unregistered players will not be displayed and the rows will remain empty.
group_type.save: Save the type group as a type

mention.intro: This privacy policy explains how we collect, use and protect your information when you use one of the 3 applications.</br>The 3 applications are:

auth.title: Identification used in the application
auth.content: A non-personal authentication system (that is to say which does not allow you to be identified) is used to log in and use our applications. It is associated with your unique Discord identifier.

collect.title: Information collected
collect.content: We do not collect any personal information, the information collected is as follows:
list: Discord Information: Your ID, username, profile picture and discord roles

Conqueror's Blade game content information: information about the units (level, mastery) of your IG barracks (in game) as well as your hero (level, class played, influence) and your presence at the next territory war

cookie.title: Cookies
cookie.content: The website only uses a functional cookie (Strictly Necessary Cookies).</br>There are no Performance Cookies, Functionality Cookies or Marketing Targeting Cookies.

use.title: Use of Information
use.content: The information collected is made available to users of the management group to enable them to prepare for turf wars. No other use is made of it.

storage.title: Data storage
storage.content: The data is stored as long as you are in a group associated with the Discord bot, if you are removed from the groups associated with the Discord bot, all your data is deleted from our database.</br>Similarly, if the Discord bot is removed from a discord (kicked or banned), all data concerning the house, the discord as well as the players in the associated groups are deleted from our database.

rgpd.title: Data protection
rgpd.content: We take the security of your data very seriously. We use industry-standard security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure.

share.title: Sharing information
share.content: We do not sell or share information with any third parties.

image_right.title: Conqueror's Blade Content Rights Notice
image_right.content:
The images, logos and other content on this site belong to their respective owners. We do not claim any rights to these elements and they are used for informational or illustrative purposes only.
If you are the rights holder of a content and wish it to be modified or deleted, please contact us at fabiendeveloppeur76@gmail.com. We undertake to take the necessary measures as soon as possible.
